# Glottography dataset derived from Bowern and Atkinson 2012 "Computational phylogenetics and the internal structure of Pama-Nyungan"

[![CLDF validation](https://github.com/Glottography/bowern2012pamanyungan/workflows/CLDF-validation/badge.svg)](https://github.com/Glottography/bowern2012pamanyungan/actions?query=workflow%3ACLDF-validation)

## How to cite

If you use these data please cite
- the original source
  > Bowern, Claire & Quentin Atkinson. 2012. Computational phylogenetics and the internal structure of Pama-Nyungan. Language 88. 817-845. doi: 10.2307/23357554.
- the derived dataset using the DOI of the [particular released version](../../releases/) you were using

## Description


The dataset provides non-overlapping speaker areas for major current subgroups of Pama-Nyungan derived from Figure 1 in Bowern and Atkinson 2012.

This dataset is licensed under a CC-BY-4.0 license

## CLDF Datasets

The following CLDF datasets are available in [cldf](cldf):

- CLDF [Generic](https://github.com/cldf/cldf/tree/master/modules/Generic) at [cldf/Generic-metadata.json](cldf/Generic-metadata.json)
